_comment: Smite Docs Editor MCP Configuration Example
_description: Copy this file to .claude/.smite/docs-config.json and customize for your project
_enabled_note: Master switch for the docs editor. Set to false to disable automatic documentation updates.
_logLevel_note: Logging level: 'error', 'warn', 'info', 'debug'. Debug shows detailed parsing steps.

readme._autoUpdate_note: Automatically update README when code changes are detected.
readme._preserveManualEdits_note: Preserve sections marked with <!-- SMITE:MANUAL:START --> and <!-- SMITE:MANUAL:END -->
readme._generateDiff_note: Generate a markdown diff showing changes before applying them.
readme._readmePath_note: Path to README file relative to project root.

sections._note: Control which sections are automatically updated.

installation._enabled_note: Update Installation section based on package.json dependencies.
installation._includeDevDependencies_note: Include devDependencies in the installation section.

architecture._enabled_note: Update Architecture section with project overview.
architecture._includeTechStack_note: List main technologies and frameworks used.

structure._enabled_note: Update Project Structure section by scanning directories.
structure._maxDepth_note: Directory depth to scan for structure section.
structure._excludePatterns_note: Directory patterns to exclude from structure scan.

openapi._enabled_note: Enable OpenAPI spec generation and updates.

scan._note: Control how API routes are scanned.
scan._patterns_note: Glob patterns for files containing API route definitions.

jsdoc._outputPath_note: Directory where JSDoc HTML output will be generated.

scan._note: Control which files are scanned for JSDoc generation.
scan._include_note: Glob patterns for files to document.
scan._exclude_note: Glob patterns for files to exclude.

markdown._format_note: Auto-format markdown sections (consistent spacing, headers, etc.).

toc._enabled_note: Auto-generate table of contents in README.
toc._maxLevel_note: Maximum heading level to include in TOC (1-6).

qualityGate._enabled_note: Trigger documentation updates after quality gate validation passes.
qualityGate._waitForValidation_note: Only update docs if code passes quality validation.

git._commitMessage_note: Commit message template for documentation updates.
git._createBranch_note: Create a new branch for documentation updates.
